summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Foothills Walkthrough
            - Section Title: Rhino Watch Slope

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Foothills Walkthrough

This will include Hound, Jackal, and Eagle Soldiers, as well as the tougher looker variants with shields called Captain of the Court.

As you get closer to the first Keeper's Shrine of the area, you'll see a large group of soldiers appear. Clear these out and then you can activate the shrine.

Be sure to check the Shrine Shop while you're here, and revisit the Zodiac Village to see what new items everyone has to offer.

Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop
| Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop              | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop       |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| Body-Cooling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Shock-Quelling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Tonifying Decoction (x3) - 360 Will |                                |
| Mind Core (x6) - 3000 Will          | Find Gold Thread (x2) - 3000 Will     | Celestial Ribbon (x1) - 9000 Will   | Gold Tree Core (x1) - 4500 Wil |


Now drop down from the Feng-Tail General and activate the nearby Keeper's Shrine. You'll see a field straight in front of you that's strewn with soldiers and fire. Before you head here, let's go find the second optional Poison Chief miniboss that's nearby.

## Rhino Watch Slope

Facing the Keeper's Shrine, fly up from it and look to the right. Get as high as you can, and you'll see a large rock. Head straight toward it and over it, then continue past and turn slightly to the right again."
            - Following Text: "In the midst of the trees, there's a small patch of ground with no grass. The Poison Chief can be found here.

### Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 2

Thankfully, each of the Poison Chief fights is pretty much the same. You can expect the same moveset and should prepare for them in the same way.

When the second Poison Chief is down, return to the Rhino Watch Slope and then head into the area with the flames on the ground. A cutscene will play out as you get there, and the Gold Armored Rhino will appear.

### Yaoguai Chief - Gold Armored Rhino"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text describes the progression through the "Foothills Walkthrough" section, focusing on clearing soldiers near a Keeper's Shrine and exploring nearby areas. Players are encouraged to activate the shrine, visit the Shrine Shop, and locate an optional miniboss, the Poison Chief, near the Rhino Watch Slope.

Image Summary:
The image depicts a forested area with a small patch of ground devoid of grass, highlighted by a red arrow. This location is likely the spot where players can find the second optional miniboss, the Poison Chief, as described in the context. The elevated perspective suggests guidance for navigation.

Following Text Summary:
The following text provides details about encountering and defeating the Poison Chief miniboss, emphasizing its predictable moveset. After defeating the miniboss, players are instructed to return to the Rhino Watch Slope and proceed to an area with flames, where a cutscene introduces the Gold Armored Rhino boss.
